titleStmt.title: The true inquisition or The sad soules search Preached at Newport, May 29. 1632 in the primary visitation of the worshipfull Mr. Edvvard Burbye, Archdeacon of Winton. dBy W. Iones, B. of D. preacher to the Isle of Wight, and Vicar of Arreton.
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, b. 1581 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones dwelling in Red-crosse-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
